channel.title: So what easter eggs were in HL2?
channel.description:
Everybody knows that there were [u]lots[/u] of easter eggs in HL1 (and Opposing Force, Blue Shift and Decay). But what about easter eggs in HL2 (and EPs 1 and 2)?
(If this doesn't warrants it's own thread as theres this [url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=4804'][i]one[/i][/url] just erase this thread)

item.title: So what easter eggs were in HL2?
item.dc:creator: mechaelite
item.description:
to be trully noclip makes me feel good. Call me cheater if you want but I love fly while shooting the ar2 alt fire around the place.

EDIT: surelly some1 will say a word wich starts by H and ends by AX

Read full topic
item.source: So what easter eggs were in HL2?

item.title: So what easter eggs were in HL2?

item.description:
We all go through this, son. It’ll be okay.

Read full topic
item.source: So what easter eggs were in HL2?

item.title: So what easter eggs were in HL2?
item.dc:creator: DanO
item.description:
Yesterday I noclipped for the first time. Nothing’s going to be the same. I feel wrong and weird.

On the plus side, I did find Dr. Breen sat in a room in the sky, and got to shoot him in the head, so that was some compensation.

Seriously, I’m slightly worried noclipping may have ruined everything forever.

Read full topic
item.source: So what easter eggs were in HL2?

item.title: So what easter eggs were in HL2?
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
duh4563:

it would be nice if someone could be a little more specific maybe a screenshot
ive played through hl2 a dozen times and never found this suicide guy

[COLOR=‘Red’]!!!DANGER: SPOILER ALERT!!![/SIZE]
He’s in behind the gas storage tank opposite the station, on the other side of the road, along with a 357, some small props, and graffiti.

[COLOR=‘Red’]!!!DANGER: SPOILER OVER!!![/SIZE]

Read full topic

item.title: So what easter eggs were in HL2?
item.dc:creator: duh4563
item.description:
JeffMOD:

On the coast, near the gas station. That’s as specific as I’m getting, as it is an easter egg and an achievement.

Side note: I don’t get achievements because I use offline mode.

it would be nice if someone could be a little more specific maybe a screenshot
ive played through hl2 a dozen times and never found this suicide guy

item.title: So what easter eggs were in HL2?
item.dc:creator: Yanson
item.description:
emm… about those H.E.V. suit charger plates - i think that in hl2 there’s actually two of them. one in black mesa east junkyard and another one somewhere in canals at one of combine outposts. (I may be wrong 'couse I haven’t played hl2 in a really long time.)

Read full topic

item.title: So what easter eggs were in HL2?
item.dc:creator: Vampire95
item.description:
pirishlad:

there were some lost easter eggs and you could find a H.E.V. suit charger plate there too.

Yeah, I know, I have a thread about it. :freeman:

Read full topic
item.source: So what easter eggs were in HL2?

item.title: So what easter eggs were in HL2?
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
You’re thinking Episode 2. However, HL2 had a suit charger plate as well, and Eli’s lab has a volume of “LOST BOOKS”, where LOST is the only plainly visible part, so that may lead to confusion (it did for me )
There’s also suicide guy, all the gman sightings, and various weapon caches.

Read full topic
item.source: So what easter eggs were in HL2?

:freeman:
